scripts.dev: yarn workspace @vue-skuilder/common build && node scripts/dev-couchdb.js start && concurrently "yarn dev:vue" "yarn dev:express"
scripts.ci:e2e: yarn dev & wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cypress run; kill $(lsof -t -i:8080); yarn couchdb:stop
scripts.build: yarn workspace @vue-skuilder/common build && yarn workspace @vue-skuilder/vue build && yarn workspace @vue-skuilder/express build
